show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Guest: Herbalist Susan Weed Host Dr. <!--more--> Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG, www.drznaturally.
com, interviews Wise Woman Herbalist, SUSUN S.
WEED, the voice of the Wise Woman Tradition, and one of the “founding grandmothers of the herbal renaissance.
” Her four previous bestseller titles include New Menopausal Years the Wise Woman Way; Breast Cancer?
Breast Health!
The Wise Woman Way; Healing Wise, the Second Wise Woman Herbal; and Wise Woman Herbal for the Childbearing Year.
Weed maintains an active, worldwide teaching schedule.
She offers correspondence courses, online education through theWiseWomanUniversity, and shamanic apprenticeships.
She has taught at YaleNurseMidwiferySchool, AmericanCollege of Nurse Midwives, BastyrNaturopathicCollege, RockyMountainCenter for Botanical Studies, American Botanical Council, Weg der Mitte (Berlin), and Waikato College of Herbal Studies in New Zealand.
Today , Susan will discuss her new book on sexual health, Down There: Sexual and Reproductive Health, the Wise Woman Way.
